page.title: 19EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content: {FIRE SERVICES} They train for 12 weeks at Brigade Training School.You have to be 18 years old to start training.They must be{170cm}tall and measure at least{90cm }around the chest.They must be able to carry a 12 stone man 100 yards in 12 seconds. The{FIRE ENGINE}carries cutting tools and{10.5}m ladders for small houses and{15.5m}ladders for bigger houses. They have oxygen tanks, gas masks, fire proof suits and torches.The fire engines carry 400 gallons of water. The fire men take their bleepers just in case of an emergency.If the bleeper sounds they rush to the Fire Station, ready to fight the fire. They get around 25 to 30 emergencies every month.
